title: buddhivantanalla
sahitya:
buddhivantanalla ranganu


anupallavi

  muddu mADi magana salahide gOpi


caraNam 1    Avu kAya pOgi yamunA tIradali maDuva tumuki kALingana beDe tuLidane
    caraNam 2    heDeya tuLidu hAvina mEle malagi kaDu nidre kaivanu sAdhu bAlakane
    caraNam 3    haddanEri koNDu jagavella tirugi geddu bAhO buddhi ivagake
    caraNam 4    mAra banda haNNU heDige sUrekomba vAraNAdindali bhayasikombane
    caraNam 5    kaNDanuLLa heNDira koNDu oidu avara bhaNDu mAduvanI purandara viTTala
